sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Inkscape is a vector graphics editor application. It is distributed under a free software license, the GNU GPL. Its stated goal is to become a powerful graphics tool while being fully compliant with the XML, SVG, and CSS standards.

sections.title: Installation
sections.content: Install the inkscape package. For the development version, install the inkscape-gitAUR package.

sections.title: Pan using spacebar and mouse does not work
sections.content: See Libinput#Enable the touchpad while typing

sections.title: See also
sections.content:
